abstract.para: A summary of the SDG's charter

webpage.para:
The Swarm Development Group's charter includes:
the maintenance and development of Swarm
the development of documentation of Swarm
the provision of technical support and assistance to the user community
the maintenance of user group mailing lists
the organization of user group conferences and workshops
the retention of copyright for all code released as part of Swarm
the responsibility for all code included in official Swarm releases
the promotion of Swarm and funding-raising effort
the maintenance of a listing of active Swarm programmers and projects
